name: ily-ayu
description: A CLI love letter that whispers my heart's words

scripts.test: echo 'And while I may not possess the power to pluck the moon from the night sky for you, I can certainly hold up a mirror that reflects your radiant brilliance—reminding you of the extraordinary light you bring into my life with every passing day.❤‍🩹🫶🏻'

author: Aftab
